content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple (not drained)" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Stir together lemon juice, corn syrup, soy sauce, salt, ginger, and corn oil in a bowl until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Stir"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "lemon juice"@17:28 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "corn syrup"@30:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "soy sauce"@42:51 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "salt"@53:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "ginger"@59:65 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "corn oil"@71:79 / FOOD )
		:heat ( tool-1-0 "a bowl"@83:89 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until smooth"@90:102 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Stir in the crushed pineapple with its liquid.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "the crushed pineapple"@11:32 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "its liquid"@38:48 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Place the chicken legs in an ovenproof glass baking dish, and pour sauce over top.
4) Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes, then turn the chicken over, and continue cooking until the chicken is tender, and no longer pink, about 20 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "preheated oven"@11:25 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "30 minutes"@30:40 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "turn"@47:51 / AC
		:ppt ( "the chicken"@52:63 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-2 "continue cooking"@74:90 / AC
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until the chicken is tender, and no longer pink"@91:138 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-4-1 "20 minutes"@146:156 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Baste with sauce frequently while baking.
